deleteCamp() - Method in class Staff
Deletes a camp from the list of camps created by the staff member If the staff member has not created any camps, a message is displayed The staff member is prompted to choose a camp to delete, and the camp is removed from the list and the repository if there are no registered participants

FileCheck - Class in controller.file
The FileCheck class provides method to check if essential CSV files exist in the application It includes file paths for student, staff, camp commmittee, suggestion, enquiry, camp details and camp student list CSV files The main purpose of this class is to determine whether these files exist, which is crucial for proper functioning when reading or writing data to and from these files
FileCheck() - Constructor for class FileCheck
 
FileExist() - Static method in class FileCheck
Checks if essential CSV files exist Iterates through the array of file paths and check if each file exists
filePath - Variable in class Report
filePath refers to the filePath where report is generated filePath is to be updated or overriden
FileRead - Class in controller.file
The FileRead class provides methods for reading data from CSV files into the application It supports reading user-related data (CampCommittee, Student, Staff), camp details camp student lists, suggestions and enquiries from their respective CSV files The class includes a method to conditionally reset the data by reading from default CSV files when specified by the user
FileRead() - Constructor for class FileRead

FileWriting - Class in controller.file

readWithoutReset() - Static method in class FileRead
Reads data without a reset from exisiting CSV files If the CSV files do not exist, it prints a message indicating that it is the first time entering the system and uses the reset method instead Calls methods from ReadUser, ReadCampDetails, ReadCampStudentList, ReadSuggestion and ReadEnquiry classes to read data without a reset
readWithoutReset() - Static method in class ReadSuggestion
Reads suggestions from the CSV file without resetting Parses each line of the file, creates Suggestion objects and updates repository If the suggestion status is PENDING, adds it to the corresponding camp's list of suggestions

Reads enquiries from the CSV file with resetting its content Resets the content of the CSV file by overwriting it with a header line
readWithReset() - Static method in class FileRead
Reads data with a reset from default CSV files Calls methods from ReadUser, ReadCampDetails, ReadCampStudentList, ReadSuggestion and ReadEnquiry classes to read data with a reset and then writes the reset data to the corresponding CSV files using FileWriting
readWithReset() - Static method in class ReadSuggestion
Resets the content of the suggestions CSV file by overwriting it with a new header This method is used when a reset of the suggestions data is required
